message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me there?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  I could come down to $135, but I can't go any lower than that. It's a very fair price for what you're getting.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $135 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
